experience.description: A Highly interactive SPA, that helps coaches and athletes collaborate, plan, track and analyze training with clear goals of performance optimization
contribution: Joined as one of the earliest employees at this Canberra based startup
Built Beautiful, Robust and Engaging core-components
Worked in close collaboration with the Founders and Helped develop the platform that now has millions of users

projects.name: Today's Plan Platform
projects.description: A Single-page-application that helps cyclists and their coaches collaborate, plan, track and analyze training with clear goals of performance optimization

projects.name: Customizable Dashboards
projects.description: Helps users Create, Edit, Customize Dashboards based on their individual preferences

projects.name: Calendar
projects.description: Today’s Plan’s Calendar, the core area for users to interact with the training platform

experience.description: Built technologies that helped athletes perform better, using the biggest online endurance sports training platform and API
contribution: Made Architectural changes to enable RiderHub to be embedded into Android and iOS app (Ride) using Webviews
Reduced Development costs, Maintenance costs, and the release cycles with single code-base for multiple platforms
Acted as single point of contact for multiple projects, doing Enhancements, Code-refactoring, Reducing Tech-debt etc

projects.name: Content Feed
projects.description: Developed Initially for Specialized, and later repurposed for Today’s Plan users, this feature helps admins Create, Edit, Publish content to targeted cyclists, so they can read it on their feed inside Rider-Hub or Ride-App. Features include: Image editor, WYSIWYG Editor etc

projects.name: Route Builder
projects.description: Developed Initially for Today’s plan and later repurposed for Specialized users, this feature helps cyclists Create, Edit, Import, Export Routes to devices like Garmin. Users can also associate them to Workouts and Events. More details here: https://www.todaysplan.com.au/routes/

projects.name: Rider-Hub
projects.description: A web application that helps Specialized consumers view into their ride data and analytics
details: Users can: Participate in Community riding, by searching/subscribing for rides and events at a location of their preference
Users can: Read targeted content from Specialized; Create/Import/Export Routes; Associate Bikes, Equipment etc to Rides; Look into the Metrics over selected periods

projects.name: Ride-App
projects.description: Developed Specialized component app for riders to get the most out of their cycling experience
details: Uses Rider-hub code inside iOS and Android versions (Hybrid using Webviews) of the Specialized Ride app, saving Specialized a lot of resources and re-work
Core developer from Today’s Plan, the Australian counter part, and later handed it over to 2-3 developers based in US
The native parts of the app has been developed in US, which talks to the Cycling sensors over Bluetooth, Ant+ etc

projects.name: Admin Portal
projects.description: One stop for all the Authentication and Authorization needs of Specialized internal (admins) and external (retailers) users
details: Portal helps Specialized users do the admin operations like Bike Registrations, Provisioning 3rd party keys enabling them to develop sports apps using Today’s Plan’s proprietary backend api (that crunches on the ride files of over a dozen formats) etc.
Uses Single Sign-in (with SAML and OAuth)
